By tearing down artificial barriers and opening markets, FTAs unleash a cascade of benefits that directly lift wages, expand employment opportunities, and raise the standard of living for millions of laborers.

Export‑oriented sectors expand dramatically when tariffs disappear, and those sectors need more hands on the factory floor, in logistics, and in services. Workers who receive such training enjoy higher employability, better career trajectories, and stronger bargaining power.
